name: Danang City day tour
description: Danang city is one of the first level cities in Vietnam compare with Hanoi Capital, Hai Phong city, Can Tho city, Saigon city (Ho Chi Minh City). It has many beautiful beaches. Danang also owns many interesting sightseeings such as Son Tra Peninsula, Linh Ung – Lady Buddha, Ba Na Hills, Cu Lao Cham Island, Cham Museum… Beside the landscapes, Danang’s culture and Danang Food is also a highlight spot. Spend 1 day in Danang to learn about its culture, food and landscape is a must thing to do.
